      public static List<ChessPlayer> findByName(String name)
      Method used for finding all the ChessPlayers with the given name
      Parameters:
      name - A string with the name number of the players to find
      Returns:
      Returns null if the name doesn't exist in the database or a list of all the ChessPlayer if it does
